__e: When I say run, we run!
Okay, just run, run. Run free.
When I say run, you run.
On the contrary, the risk is all on your side.
You realize, my child, you're in great danger.
She insists that you are in great danger.
- But you still get involved with them.
I can no longer sit and wish away the days as the other women do while you chase a legend, a fairy tale that has already cost us dearly in lives and gold.
That's why you keep running after every little thing.
And he says lots of times you don't even run downcourt.
If you don't run, you can't win.
Don't run. I mean you no harm.
Otherwise, you could damage your vision permanently.
You are in as much danger as we are as long as you're here.
Questions... How fast do you run the hundred?
